### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of a furnace with 27 coal as fuel, positioned at (62.0, -54.0) with direction UP, and has a status of NO_INGREDIENTS.

### Offshore Pump at position (107.5, -33.5)
Consists of an offshore pump with direction UP, positioned at (107.5, -33.5), connected to pipes at positions (107.5, -34.5) and (108.5, -34.5).

### Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of a boiler with direction UP, positioned at (111.5, -32.0), connected to pipes at positions (109.5, -32.5), (109.5, -33.5), (111.5, -33.5), (112.5, -33.5), (113.5, -33.5), and (109.5, -31.5).

### Steam Engine at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of a steam engine with direction UP, positioned at (117.5, -30.5), connected to pipes at positions (115.5, -33.5), (116.5, -33.5), (117.5, -33.5), and a small electric pole at position (119.5, -30.5).

### Water Pipe Group at position (107.5, -34.5)
Consists of a pipe group with fluid system 119039, fluid water, and pipes at positions (107.5, -34.5), (108.5, -34.5), (109.5, -34.5), (109.5, -32.5), (109.5, -33.5), and (109.5, -31.5).

### Steam Pipe Group at position (117.5, -34.5)
Consists of a pipe group with fluid system 119043, fluid steam, and pipes at positions (117.5, -34.5), (118.5, -34.5), (119.5, -34.5), and others.

### Electricity Group at position (119.5, -30.5)
Consists of an electricity group with id 574770, pole at position (119.5, -30.5), and voltage 0.

### Belts at positions (63.5, -53.5) and (64.5, -53.5)
Consists of two belts with direction UP, positioned at (63.5, -53.5) and (64.5, -53.5).

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities.
- Check the entity's status and warnings to determine if it is capable of accepting the items.

### Errors when using offshore pumps and boilers
- Ensure the offshore pump and boiler are properly connected to pipes and have the necessary fuel and fluids.
- Check the entity's status and warnings to determine if it is working correctly.

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure the steam engine is properly connected to pipes and has the necessary input liquid.
- Check the entity's status and warnings to determine if it is working correctly.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions or important variables are defined in this report.
